abstract: If you watch John McCain’s latest political ads on YouTube, you’ll see another ad superimposed over part of the image.
snippet: If you watch John McCain’s latest political ads on YouTube, you’ll see another ad superimposed over part of the image.
lead_paragraph: We live in a world with advertising everywhere, but you don’t tend to see ads with ads on them.

headline.main: McCain’s YouTube Ads Have Google Ads

abstract: Google thrives by cutting fat, Facebook mulls a music service and more.
snippet: Google thrives by cutting fat, Facebook mulls a music service and more.
lead_paragraph: In so many ways, Google does not operate in the same universe the rest of us do. The atmosphere in its world is so infused with money from the company’s singular advertising model that normal rules of physics don’t apply in the way we are used to. Notice how Planet Google reacts to an economic earthquake: Initially, at least, hardly anything shakes. This and a few more headlines in today’s Quick Bits.

headline.main: Quick Bits: Fat Times for Google, Lean Ones for Credit Thieves
